title: Sound On: Covid Funding Bill Stalls, Ukraine Aid
itunes:title: Sound On: Covid Funding Bill Stalls, Ukraine Aid
description:
Bloomberg Government Congress reporters Jack Fitzpatrick and Emily Wilkins spoke to guests: Congressman Derek Kilmer of Washington, Chris Meekins, Healthcare Policy Analyst and Managing Director at Raymond James and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
